Order ice chocolate, gave without ice and have to request for new one, tribus chicken fried rice was tasteless and chicken was cold once after served. Mee goreng mamak was okay abit. Last was about mushroom soup taste so salty. Kinda dissapointed with the food.
Great food Great value! The portion is huge and the food is delicious. The lunch deal is super worthy.. only 12.80 with drinks. Staff are friendly and the seatings are comfortable too

Had a really nice late night dinning experience at Tribus. Atmosphere was really relaxing with nice music being played. What stood out were the service staff. All of them were so attentive and hospitable. Food was delicious. Well done Tribus crew.
We had a delicious and delightful night at TRIBUS. Food and the surprise cake was heart warming. Do try their mexican food is top notch
